review: Other than the fact that my productiveness has been significantly diminished, I have nothing bad to say about this gizmo.
author: Joel Meister

review: I love my Fire Stick.  I am just figuring out all of the things that it can do; however, up to this point we are totally happy with it!
author: Brian S. Brown

review: No different then Nex-flix. Can't see 200,000 movies as advertised on your TV. You have to get on computer and spend hours going through old movies then transfer them to your TV watch list. Not worth the yearly $99.00 fee. Plan on returning it to store.
author: George Cameron

review: It has a nice interface and I had high hope. But when we are watching Netflix we keep getting hiccups, little pauses periodically. Not unusable but still worse than my Blu Ray player Netflix app. Disappointing.
author: Jane Doe

review: I expected more free movies and shows being a Prime member.  They should also tell you that you need to have a paid subscription to Netflix to use it.
author: Kirsten

review: Works with YouTube which is a plus
author: M Chadd "Shellaree"

review: As easy to set up as I heard it was.
author: John E Kusturiss Jr
